Class SerializationStorageProvider<T>

java.lang.Object
com.group6.hms.app.storage.SerializationStorageProvider<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of items stored in this provider
All Implemented Interfaces:
StorageProvider<T>, Serializable
public class SerializationStorageProvider<T> extends Object implements StorageProvider<T>
A storage provider that manages a list of items and provides serialization and deserialization functionality to save and load the items from a file.
See Also:
